messages.content:
The user asked you to create the source code with the following specification:
```
<REQUEST>
<goal>show the data from `simpleValue2`</goal>

<description>Show the data from the `simpleValue2` charm, displaying its current value and any associated metadata.</description>
</REQUEST>
<PLAN>1. Create a component that reads from the simplevalue2.values array in the existing schema
2. Implement a simple list view that displays each string value as a list item
3. Add basic styling and empty state handling for when the values array is empty</PLAN>
<SPEC>The SimpleValue2 Viewer will read and display all string values stored in the simplevalue2.values array. It will present each value as a list item in a clean, readable format. The viewer will automatically update when the underlying data changes.</SPEC>
```
